property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inner strength is never seen until it makes all the difference.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most smiths shape metal, but some prefer more delicate materials.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. −2: Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. −7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control dies, you may sacrifice Ajani's Last Stand. If you do, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, if you control a Plains, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers." - Jazal Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot defend others if your own well-being is neglected."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all creatures. • Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dwarven Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These storied halls are under my protection."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) When Gallant Cavalry enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our duty does not stop at our borders."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Herald of Faith attacks, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clerics prayed for salvation. The soldiers prayed for victory. Both prayers were answered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hieromancer's Cage enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Hieromancer's Cage leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!" - General Avitora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light." - Song of All, canto 1008

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target permanent with mana value 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Threefold were his crimes, doubled were his pleas, singular was his fate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as my faith persists, so shall I."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lena, Selfless Champion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each nontoken creature you control. Sacrifice Lena: Creatures you control with power less than Lena's power gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who do evil and those who do nothing are equally worthy of contempt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, Leonin Vanguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best fighters are skilled in both harming and healing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Leonin Warleader attacks, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink that are tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When one leonin hunts, many more are surely nearby.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loxodons are firm in stature and spirit. No matter the odds, they are always first into battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) When Militia Bugler enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 2 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) As long as Novice Knight is enchanted or equipped, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the greatest hero begins with nothing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The leonin of Oreskos are quick to take offense - not because they are thin-skinned, but because they are always ready for a fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pegasus chooses its rider, bearing the worthy into the clouds and tossing all others to the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lifetime of keeping up appearances is not enough to earn an eternity of rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 5 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance. {3}{W}{W}{W}: Until end of turn, Resplendent Angel gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in." - Torricks, battlefield medic

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Native to wide prairies and scrublands, falcons occasionally roost in dragon skeletons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Mare can't be blocked by red creatures. When Shield Mare enters the battlefield or becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it passes, order defeats chaos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: White as starlight on snow, it appears only on the eve of the winter solstice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Suncleanser enters the battlefield, choose one - • Remove all counters from target creature. It can't have counters put on it for as long as Suncleanser remains on the battlefield. • Target opponent loses all counters. That player can't get counters for as long as Suncleanser remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back." - Hewen Frit, merchant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Knights you control get +1/+1. {3}{W}{W}: Knights you control gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defeat is no reason for retreat. It is a sign we must redouble our efforts to win this fight."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can't find a doorway, make one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say perfection is unattainable, but they said that about flight too."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not." - Ludevic, necro-alchemist

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I decide what stands in my way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Departed Deckhand becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it. Departed Deckhand can't be blocked except by Spirits. {3}{U}: Another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by Spirits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stars mark your destiny. May you accept the fate thus divulged."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -6/-0. When enchanted creature blocks, destroy it. (The attacking creature remains blocked.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The collection didn't have room to expand, so the wizard improvised a solution.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{U}{U}: Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!" - Gertrude, deep-sea angler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gearsmith Prodigy gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Young artificers on Kaladesh let their imaginations run wild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As Metamorphic Alteration enters the battlefield, choose a creature. Enchanted creature is a copy of the chosen creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Mirror Image enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The life of a shapeshifter is one of constant change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Mistcaller: Until end of turn, if a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hospitality is of little concern to those who do not wish to be disturbed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The delight of discovery drives the pursuit of knowledge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The things I once imagined would be my greatest achievements were only the first steps toward a future I can only begin to fathom." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt . . . incredible." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent mills three cards, then you draw a card for each land card put into their graveyard this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas would not rest until he was restored to his former glory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To break another's mind is to deliver a fate worse than death. It is a terrifying power." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious." - Garild, merfolk mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.value: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A king's knowledge does not vanish when the heart stops beating.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Surge Mare can't be blocked by green creatures. Whenever Surge Mare deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. {1}{U}: Surge Mare gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it passes, waves touch the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Say hello to your new friend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. [0]: Draw a card. If you control three or more artifacts, draw two cards instead. −9: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kinds of experiments that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cold slowed their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seafloor is flecked with the bones of fools who dared to sail into the mist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Predicting the future is a messy business.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {3}{B}{B}, Exile seven other cards from your graveyard: Return Bone Dragon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its roar is the clatter of a thousand bones.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Flying, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pit yawned open, a column of oily smoke arose, and a towering form hissed, "I accept this offering."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs." - Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It hurts more if you think about it." - Hooks, Cabal torturer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Fell Specter enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card. Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player loses half their life, then discards half the cards in their hand, then sacrifices half the creatures they control. Round up each time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Great Mending that healed the Multiverse also unraveled the threads of Nicol Bolas's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rise and shine, my dears. We have work to do." - Isareth the Awakener

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target colorless creature. You gain life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When these intruders are gone, Zendikar will be my throne, my palace, my playground."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Isareth the Awakener attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. −2: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control. −3: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not work if you enjoy it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 1 life. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: That feeling of something on your chest is usually sleep paralysis. Occasionally, it's something else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control. When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Plague Mare can't be blocked by white creatures. When Plague Mare enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it passes, those who sleep dream of sickness and death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Harpy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A harpy's hoard is a filthy, bloodstained pile of trinkets and corpses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance." - Isareth the Awakener

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have given all to your kingdom, dear knight. Serenity shall be your prize." - Queen Lian

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imagine a thousand tiny mushrooms cropping up within your lungs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thread the torsos together with angel hair to ensure they will cooperate in battle." - The Stitcher's Tome

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Vampire Sovereign enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your service shall be rewarded." - Queen Lian

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared." - Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name. Lands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them. If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As I desire, so it shall be." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the hyperstormic generator crept past redline, a being emerged from the arc.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Dismissive Pyromancer: It deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First the insult, then the encore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Finish deals 7 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Goblins you control get +1/+1. Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Folks 'round here are too in love with their contraptions. Does them some good if we smash one every so often."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I found a new toy. Wanna play?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For devils, burning things is the highest form of comedy, diversion, and artistic expression.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bellow of a minotaur always translates to "charge."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of each end step, if Inferno Hellion attacked or blocked this turn, its owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. {1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Lightning Mare can't be blocked by blue creatures. {1}{R}: Lightning Mare gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it passes, storm clouds bolt across the land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. [+1]: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells. −7: Create four 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 4, 5, or 6, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to any target. Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 7 or greater, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No rampart can withstand the fury of a giant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The creation of new weapons demands the destruction of others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spit Flame deals 4 damage to target creature. Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Spit Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!" - Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Thud deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?" - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sound of the trumpets lights a fire in the hearts of the bold and snuffs the courage of the cowardly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Viashino Pyromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nicol Bolas destroyed my world. I owe it to Skalla to celebrate all life, no matter how dangerous." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind." - Ramal, sage of Westgate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them." - Inti, Sun Empire knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its ventricles weep venom, and it consumes only poison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you think yourself a chief, then prove your might." - Gar-Tun, Mistvalley silverback

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets Druid of Horns, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No welcome for those who trespass. Only fang and horn and claw.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land already knows its destiny. I simply ask it to share the tale with me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {4}{G}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Elvish Clancaller, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No single root feeds the forest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Ghastbark Twins can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They grow closer with every passing season.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After everything I've survived, it's hard to be frightened by anything anymore." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each tooth is the length of a horse, and new ones grow in every sixteen days. Let's get a closer look!" - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells you cast with power 4 or greater cost {2} less to cast. Whenever Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma attacks, each creature you control with power 4 or greater gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You don't want to know how she got that name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Highland Game dies, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon Arel's head. She hears the wisdom of our ancestors." - Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hungering Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Hungering Hydra can't be blocked by more than one creature. Whenever Hungering Hydra is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines." - Iveta, rooftop runner

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?" - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats what it wants to eat - which is anything that moves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." - Dejara, Giltwood druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +7/+7 and has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look how cute it is now!" - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You should have seen the look on both their faces." - Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bones of the past will tell their tales - if you know how to speak their language."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rhox Oracle enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The further into the future I look, the less certain my vision. Even now, the middle distance is obscured by fire."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only casualties were a snapped spear, a lost helmet, and some bruised egos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a creature or land that isn't a mana ability, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sun Empire's most sacred sites are protected by more than prayers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whether we like it or not, our arrival has altered the landscape." - Malcolm, navigator of the Belligerent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) {2}{G}: Return Talons of Wildwood from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Thorn Lieutenant becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. {5}{G}: Thorn Lieutenant gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly." - Alena, trapper of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Villagers employ watchdogs as guardians and companions. Druids prefer something a little bigger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Vine Mare can't be blocked by black creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it passes, the dead are displaced by flourishing life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. −3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. −8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. When a creature is put onto the battlefield this way, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control an artifact, Aerial Engineer gets +2/+0 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best of their trade know every bolt of their rigs, stem to stern.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Whenever a creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. Each creature you control with defender assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever Brawl-Bash Ogre attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Brawl-Bash Ogre gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash This spell can't be countered. Flying Discard a card: Until end of turn, Chromium, the Mutable becomes a Human with base power and toughness 1/1, loses all abilities, and gains hexproof. It can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I am to die, I will die in the embrace of immeasurable flame."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Enigma Drake's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many initiates believe it possesses secrets beyond imagining. Many have become meals trying to learn them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cries of anguish quickly spurred cries of action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Draw two cards. −3: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker. −4: Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. −12: Exile all but the bottom card of target player's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Nicol Bolas, the Ravager enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card. {4}{U}{B}{R}: Exile Nicol Bolas, the Ravager, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, trample Palladia-Mors, the Ruiner has hexproof if it hasn't dealt damage yet.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sister of Nicol Bolas. Survivor of the Elder Dragon War. The most vicious of her kin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Psychic Symbiont enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I turn around and see nothing, yet I know it is behind me. Its fingers rummage in my mind, crafting new ideas."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those of esteemed birth earn a most esteemed death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The threads of magic that protect this place were woven by my will."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {G}{U}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control, and that creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire attacks, for each player, choose target permanent that player controls. Those players sacrifice those permanents. Each player who sacrificed a permanent this way reveals the top card of their library, then puts it onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you become the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {1}. Creature tokens get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether it is magical, lucky, or merely old, it is cherished, and that gives it power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knowledge itself is neither good nor evil. Just as the wrong book in the wrong hands could doom all existence, the same book in the right hands could save it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of that library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play lands from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The grave robbers were startled, for the door to the mausoleum was already open.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Diamond Mare enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard. {T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Explosive Apparatus: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Souls are volatile things. When compressed and loaded into a handheld device, their destructive potential is quite impressive." - Dierk, geistmage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life. {3}, Sacrifice Fountain of Renewal: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Entrepreneurs have attempted to sell the water, but to no avail. Whatever magic it contains disappears upon bottling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to." - Bonovar, siege commander

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gearsmith Guardian gets +2/+0 as long as you control a blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made in its creator's image, though slightly more clangy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Magistrate's Scepter: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unwittingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sharp axe solves most problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The impact sent the soldiers scattering - then something came out of the crater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thievery requires subtlety, from the beginning of the heist to the end.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The municipal senate makes extensive use of the thopters, mostly to gather dirt on rival senators.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the books were dusty with disuse, save the one titled Camouflage and Its Practical Applications.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Transmogrifying Wand enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Transmogrifying Wand: Destroy target creature. Its controller creates a 2/4 white Ox creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Until end of turn, your opponents and creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its light exposes enemies and lays secrets bare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Prayers will curdle on the tongue and be heard by rotting ears." - Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

property.name: Rules
property.value: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah." - Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

property.name: Rules
property.value: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most holy treasures are kept far from unclean soil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped. When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bedrock has many gifts to give.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Long after the land has given up the last of its secrets, there will still be mysteries in the depths of the sea." - Kiora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tazeem's embrace is harsh, but for those that call it home, nothing else will do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond the chaos of Ghirapur lies a vibrant world where aether flows through nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. −3: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. −9: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a white card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Court Cleric gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Ajani planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The healers of Bant are second to none. I owe them a great deal for their tutelage." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Other creatures you control have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She watches over the city just as Serra watches over all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pair of domesticated griffins escaped from captivity a century ago. Now the skies are filled with the songs of their descendants.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card. [0]: Until your next turn, target artifact you control becomes a 5/5 creature in addition to its other types. −7: Put any number of cards from your hand onto the battlefield face down. They're 5/5 artifact creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Riddlemaster Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Safe passage requires only a simple answer to a simple question, traveler."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pendulum of Patterns enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Pendulum of Patterns: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its elaborate designs reveal secrets of aether's flow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tezzeret's Gatebreaker enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a blue or artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Tezzeret's Gatebreaker: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, Tezzeret's Strider has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player loses 2 life. −1: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. −7: Destroy up to two target creatures. Put up to two creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arisen Gorgon has deathtouch as long as you control a Liliana planeswalker. (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not picky about what comes up, but the less decay, the better." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {5}{B}{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once every seven years it flies on spectral wings over the moors of ancient battlefields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent discards a card. Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a black card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead who wander beyond the safety of the city of Naktamun crave only to spread their curse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control. −3: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. −9: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sarkhan's Dragonfire deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a red card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am most myself when I am least human."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever you activate an ability of a Sarkhan planeswalker, Sarkhan's Whelp deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature. −3: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. −9: Creatures you control get +4/+4 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Other creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Skalla Wolf enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a green card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This imprint was the familiar of a friend." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{G}: Ursine Champion gets +3/+3 and becomes a Bear Berserker until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would you rather feel the edge of my blade or the sharpness of my fangs?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {2}{G}: Return Vivien's Jaguar from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you control a Vivien planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of Vivien's arrows is an invocation of a species.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one. If Nexus of Fate would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Nexus of Fate and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sarkhan wandered into a tomb and back in time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as the sun rises at dawn and the days lengthen in summer, the Sun Empire has awakened after long years of quiet.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against enemy forces.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.
